display_long_description:
Unscrew VR is a cozy, physics-based puzzle game built around one simple, oddly satisfying feeling: taking things apart. Inspired by the viral “unscrew/disassembly” genre, Unscrew VR brings that tactile loop into true VR — with toys you can hold, rotate, and dismantle piece by piece.

Relax, take your time, and enjoy the calm rhythm of removing screws, unlocking mechanisms, and watching each object come apart in your hands.

🧸 Two Cozy Worlds (Included)
🔹 Kids Room — Bright, Warm & Playful

A cheerful space filled with colorful toys and a gentle vibe. Perfect for relaxing sessions and first-time players.

🔹 Graveyard — Spooky… but Whimsical

A Tim-Burton-style Halloween world with pumpkins, bones, and charming nighttime atmosphere. Not horror — just cozy seasonal vibes.

🔧 24 Hand-Crafted Toys to Disassemble

Each toy is its own little puzzle box:

Unscrew fast or slow (your choice) and watch screws fly into matching boxes

Rotate and inspect objects from any angle

Peel back layers and uncover hidden parts

Some toys include “toy inside toy” surprises

🛍️ NEW: Cosmetics Shop (Common Items Available!)

Customize your controllers with a growing collection of cosmetics:

Wraps, ray colors/styles, outline colors, base colors, and charms

Kids Room and Halloween Room each have their own themed Common cosmetics

Your equipped look is saved and stays with you across rooms and sessions

Cozy, satisfying, and perfect for short relaxing play sessions — or long “just one more toy”
